attributes.action: Bus to st margarets hope on a sunday
attributes.additional_details: We are looking to try and get a bus out to st margarets hope on a sunday. Please sign it!

rejection.details: Your e-petition does not say where St Margeret's Hope is, but I assume you are referring to the place in the Orkneys.  This is therefore a matter for the Scottish Government (which has a separate petition system).
